00022 class Socket : public NonCloneable
00023 {
00024     friend class SocketHandler;

00026     public:
00027         enum Event {
00029             c_event_data_received,
00031             c_event_data_sent,
00034             c_event_conn_established,
00037             c_event_conn_failed,
00040             c_event_conn_closed,

00046             c_event_bearer_lost
00047         };

00090

00097             m_listener = listener;
00098         }
00099 
00100     protected:
00104         virtual void OnControlMsg(const SocketControlMsg &msg);
